example: Russia to the east of the Ural Mountains is in Asia.
Most people speak Russian and are Russian Orthodox Christians.
A problem between Russia and Japan is the Northern Territories.
In the USSR, the government owned all farms and factories.
The Soviet Union broke up and now Russia has a free economy.
They get timber from large coniferous forests called Taiga.
There are many large oil and gas fields in Siberia.
They built pipelines to export oil and gas to countries in Europe.
The Trans Siberian Railway is used to transport many goods.

kana: ほっきょくかいこうろ
example: Recently, ships began to use the Northern Sea Route.
